script_text:
The air is thick with the smell of ozone. LASER GRIDS—                 
             vibrant, humming webs of red light—crisscross the room,                
             shorted out by a bypass module sparking on the floor.                  
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
             JAX (32) and MIRA (28) are waist-deep in chaos. STACKS OF              
             CASH are piled high. Six heavy DUFFEL BAGS sit engorged.               
                                                                                    
             Jax cinches the last bag shut. He checks his watch.                    
                                                                                    
                       JAX                                                          
                 Time’s up. The silent alarm just                                   
                 pinged the precinct.                                               
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                       MIRA                                                         
                 Five seconds. I’m wiping the                                       
                 internal loop.                                                     
                                                                                    
             She rips a cable out. The vault door groans.                           
                                                                                    
                       JAX                                                          
                                                                                    
                 Move. Now.                                                         
                                                                                    
             Jax swings two bags over his shoulders. They bolt.
description: Jax and Mira are in a bank vault, surrounded by laser grids and stacks of cash. They must escape before the silent alarm is triggered.
continuity_notes:
LASER GRIDS -> N/A: 
STACKS OF CASH -> N/A: 
DUFFEL BAGS -> N/A: Use Scene 1 Duffel Bags
BYPASS MODULE -> N/A: 
bypass module -> sparkling: sparking on the floor
cable -> ripped out: Mira rips a cable out
vault door -> groaning: The vault door groans

flags.note: Text describes physical risks like combat ("move. Now.") and specialized movement (vaulting).

script_text:
The lobby is a cavern of marble and shadow.                            
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
             AT THE TELLER WINDOW                                                   
                                                                                    
             Jax vaults over the mahogany counter, sliding across the               
             polished wood. He drops the bags on the other side.                    
                                                                                    
             BY THE FRONT DOOR                                                      
                                                                                    
             Mira presses her back against the glass. Outside, blue and             
                                                                                    
             red lights pulse against the rain-slicked pavement.                    
                                                                                    
                       MIRA                                                         
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                 We have a problem. They beat the                                   
                 timer.
description: Jax vaults over mahogany counter, sliding across polished wood.
continuity_notes:
marble -> CATEGORY BACKGROUND ACTORS: DUFFEL BAGS (6): Note: Background Actors could potentially be marble dummies or objects
counter -> CATEGORY SET DRESSING: STACKS OF CASH: Use Scene 1 Counter
polished wood -> CATEGORY BACKGROUND ACTORS: LASER GRIDS (6): Note: Could use laser grid for visual effect or pattern on polished wood
duffel bags -> CATEGORY PROPS: DUFFEL BAGS (6): Use Scene 1 Duffel Bags
laser grids -> CATEGORY SPECIAL EQUIPMENT: LASER GRIDS: Check functionality of laser grid for visual effect or timing purposes
stacks of cash -> CATEGORY SET DRESSING: STACKS OF CASH: Verify authenticity and condition of stacks of cash
Rain-slicked pavement -> Wetted: The rain has made the pavement wet.
Mahogany counter -> None (no physical change): No change in state

flags.note: Jax vaults over the mahogany counter with a stunt move.

script_text:
The lobby is bathed in the strobe-light effect of police               
             cruisers. Jax and Mira crouch behind a marble pillar.                  
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                       JAX                                                          
                 On three, we blow the mag-locks.                                   
                                                                                    
             Jax clicks a detonator. BOOM. The glass doors SHATTER.
description: Jax and Mira crouch behind a pillar, waiting to blow the mag-locks.
continuity_notes:
police cruisers -> CATEGORY BACKGROUND ACTORS: BYSTANDERS (0): 
marble pillar -> N/A: Use existing Set Dressing from Reference Catalog
detonator -> N/A: Use existing Props from Reference Catalog (if not, list in GAP FILLING)
glass doors -> SHATTERED: Physical state changed due to detonator explosion

flags.note: Physical risks like explosive detonation and glass shattering.

script_text:
Glass crunches under boots. TWENTY BYSTANDERS and POLICE               
             OFFICERS scatter for cover.                                            
                                                                                    
             FIVE VEHICLES dominate the street: FOUR POLICE CRUISERS                
             forming a barricade and a matte-black GETAWAY VAN.                     
                                                                                    
                       OFFICER RIVERA                                               
                                                                                    
                 DROP THE BAGS! HANDS IN THE AIR!                                   
                                                                                    
             Jax hurls a flash-bang. WHITE OUT.                                     
                                                                                    
             AT THE GETAWAY VAN                                                     
                                                                                    
             The side door slides open. Mira tosses her bags in. Jax                
             dives in after her as bullets PING off the armor.                      
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
             The van screeches forward, fishtailing into the night.                 
                                                                                    
                       JAX                                                          
                 Told you we’d make the exit.                                       
                                                                                    
                              FADE OUT.
description: Jax and Mira escape in a getaway van, pursued by police.
continuity_notes:
TWENTY BYSTANDERS -> None (Bystanders not specified in catalog): 
POLICE OFFICERS -> None (Police Officers not specified in catalog): 
FIVE VEHICLES -> Four Police Cruisers and one Getaway Van (matching category: Vehicles): Use four Police Cruisers from the catalog and add a matte-black Getaway Van to match the description.
MAHOGANY COUNTER -> Mahogany Counter (matching category: Props/Set Dressing):

STACKS OF CASH -> Stacks of Cash (matching category: Props/Set Dressing/Miscellaneous):

Police Cruisers -> N/A: Four Police Cruisers forming a barricade
Getaway Van -> Armor scratched or damaged (not explicitly stated, but bullets PING off): The van screeches forward, fishtailing into the night.

High-complexity environment with large crowds (TWENTY BYSTANDERS) and significant vehicle coordination (FIVE VEHICLES).
